comments:
build i0218-1333

Not sure if this is Platform or JDT UI.

I had build i0218-1200 installed and running. I opened a couple of class files
and then shut it down.

I installed the new build and started it. On startup I got the following
exception and my workbench layout was reset. (I was notified via a dialog)

I realize the location of the class file changed but expected behaviour is for
it to invalidate that editor, not the whole perspective.
